import React from 'react' import {post} from '../../utils/request.js' import history from '../../utils/history' import './AddOne.css' export default class AddOne extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { type: "1", amount: 0, category: "food", remark: "", } } componentDidMount() { } back(){ history.goBack() } change = e =>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } changeNum = e =>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: parseFloat(e.target.value)}); } save = () =>{ let data = { amount: this.state.amount, category: this.state.category, type: this.state.type, date: new Date(this.state.date), remark: this.state.remark, } console.log(this.state) // post('insertToBill', data).then( (res) => { // console.log(res); // }) } render() { return(
